description: Single storey outbuilding for use as "granny annexe" ancillary to the main dwelling (demolition of outbuilding).
decision_conditions:
<p class="MsoNormal" style="">The
development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the
following approved plans and documents:</p><p class="MsoNormal">2173.11.23D01
Rev 5A - Footprint; 2173.11.23D02
Rev 5A – Elevations; 2173.11.23D03
Rev 5A – Existing Location / Block Plan; 2173.11.23D04
Rev 5A - Proposed Block Plan; Supporting
Medical Evidence [sensitive] (received 05.02.24); NAPC/JD/1233/JM
– Fire Safety Strategy (received 21.12.23); NAPC/JD/1211/JM
– Flood Mitigation Statement (received 21.12.23); NAPC/JD/1126/JM
– Planning, Design and Access Statement (received 21.12.23); Signed Unilateral Undertaking (received 24.04.24)</p><p>

























</p><p class="MsoNormal">All
documents received <span style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">06.02.24 </span>unless
otherwise stated<font face="Arial, sans-serif"><span style="font-size: 11pt;"><o:p></o:p></span></font></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="">Outbuilding Use<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal">The
detached outbuilding hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other
than for purposes incidental to the residential use of the occupiers of 68
Lucas Avenue, Rayners Lane, Harrow, HA2 9UJ and shall at no point be used as primary living accommodation,
rental purposes or any other similar use</p>
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
